item.description:
Blissful Meadows Proudly Presents...
The Northeast Comedy Review

Includes Three Hilarious Comedians, a Fabulous Italian Dinner Buffet and Cash Bar.

Meet in The Chestnut Room at Blissful Meadows

Arrive between 6:30 pm and 7:00 pm
Dinner is at 7 pm
Show Begins at 8:00 PM


The Northeast Comedy Review brings three of the area's funniest stand-up comedians to entertain you all in one night.

Jim Lauletta
A favorite act wherever he goes, Jim mixes his cynical, biting, self-deprecating material with some of the most off the wall off the wall and original impressions you'll EVER see. Quoted by the Boston Globe as "...off-beat and original.". Not only is Jim one of the most popular headliners in New England, he's a regular performer in Las Vegas and Atlantic City! Jim also has an impressive resume of national television credits which include: HBO's U.S. Comedy Arts Festival's "Best of the Fest", NBC,A&E's "Caroline's Comedy Hour", Comedy Central's "Two Drink Minimum", "Stand-up, Stand-up", "Make Me Laugh", "Comic Re-mix" and "Shorties Watchin' Shorties" and Comcast's "Comedy Spotlight". With out a doubt, Jim's show will leave you wanting more.


Jason Marcus
Jason Marcus is one of the sharpest and most hard working young comics in the country. His unique style of humor comes from his broad range of experiences growing up in a racially-mixed household in Boston, MA. Comedy Bio...


Mike Shustock
Mike is a regular performer at The Funny Bone and The Comedy Studio in Boston, and brings his witty and unique sense of humor to this showcase. He is a favorite in local clubs, on college campuses and in the dinner theater circuit.
item.why: A fun night out - space is limited - RSVP Now!
item.name: Comedy Show and Dinner
